content.rendered: 5 Step Aluminium Ladder used whether it is for changing light bulbs, reaching for the top shelf, or cleaning your ceiling, the Prestige Clean Home Household Foldable aluminium ladder offers a safe choice to complete various household tasks efficiently. Featuring aluminium construction, this ladder offers a sturdy and reliable support to climb on. It has a built-in tool tray that enables you to conveniently store your tools within reach while you’re engaged in important tasks. Plus, this ladder has a load-bearing capacity of up to 150 kg, enabling hassle-free operations.

excerpt.rendered:
5 Step Aluminium Ladder

TYPE: STEP LADDER

TOTAL STEPS: 5 STEPS

FUNCTION: FOLDABLE / FOLDING LADDER

MATERIAL: ALUMINIUM

MAXIMUM LOAD: 150 KGS
